Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 7/12/1987 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from San Diego to New York (M) on 2/6/1990 (Going to SD: P Bryan Harvey, P Alejandro Pena, P Roger Salkeld. Going to NYM: P Bob Milacki, 1B Jeff Conine, LF Ray Lankford)...
Had first career hit on 4/28/1991, off Jeff Pico (LAD)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1991, off Juan Guzman (CHC)...
